channel.title: I need ssh commands for a windows 7 computer
channel.description: Does anyone know commands for ssh on a windows 7 computer? I need commands to run my server on my friends computer. I have "start run.bat" so far but I need commands to view the server windows or close the server windows etc.

item.title: I need ssh commands for a windows 7 computer
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

Moparisthebest:

To connect to an ssh server from windows you need an ssh client like PuTTy.

I already have that. I just need some commands that will help me turn on, turn off, and view the server window. Like when I had it on a linux computer, it was all so much easier.

Read full topic
item.source: I need ssh commands for a windows 7 computer
